snippet.title: Ôpe - Trailer
snippet.description:
Ôpe is a 3D platformer in which you play Bô, a small character facing many dangers thought his quest to save the balance of his world. To succeed, you will have to go through magic forest and mysterious temples to free the shamans before the Sun sets forever on the world of Ôpe...
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Steam (free): https://store.steampowered.com/app/1170200/pe/
The original title have been developed in 15 weeks by the class of 2018-2019 of Le Campus ADN located in Montreal (Canada). This video games development school produced two games this year, Blank and Ôpe. Each game has been developed by about thirty students in their last semester of the school's three dedicated programs (3D modeling, Animation and Level Design) under the supervision of local industry professionals.

Trailer made by Kevin Lévesque
